passage_text: Annette Bening was born on May 29, 1958 in Topeka, Kansas, the youngest of four children of Shirley (Ashley), a soloist and church singer, and Arnett Grant Bening, an insurance salesman. She has German and English ancestry. Her family moved to California when she was young, and she grew up there.

The youngest of four children, she was born Carol Annette Bening on 29 May 1958, to father Arnett Grant Bening, who worked for an insurance company, and mother Shirley. Her siblings are Jane, Bradley, and Byron.
